Welcome to the Tag Along Family. Here at Tag Along, We aim to reduce the number of vehicles on the roads by allowing users to share a ride and \"tag along\" to an existing ride. This ensures that only the necessary vehicles are present on the road. In doing so we enable better infrastructure usage and less carbon effects on the environment
We can\'t wait to have you on the team. But first, we need some information to get you set up on the journey to a better transport environment.
